entries.title_d: Now that you have the location of the Imperial shuttle, your orders are to intercept it and disable it. You will then proceed to launch a space assault droid on to its hull so that it can take control of the ship.
entries.title: Lok system: Kidnap the Imperial scientist.
entries.split_quest_alert: It's a trap! That's not a scientist, it's an Imperial Inquisitor!
entries.quest_location_d: You now have the coordinates of the ambush spot for the Imperial shuttle. The shuttle will pass through this area within a few minutes. If he's not there already when you arrive, search the nearby area or wait for him to arrive then ambush him.
entries.quest_inspect_d: Inspect the shuttle to make sure that it has the scientist onboard.
entries.quest_dock_d: It's a trap! There's no scientist on board. Instead there's an Imperial Inquisitor posing as the scientist. Your ships sensors have indicates that he's swallowed a tracking device, probably hoping that you will take him back to the Vortex base.
